# Read comics tracker [![Marvel Comics](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?message=Marvel%20Comics&labelColor=5c5c5c&color=f0131e&label=%20&logo=data:image/x-icon;base64,)](https://www.marvel.com/)
[![Website read-comics-tracker.herokuapp.com](https://img.shields.io/website-up-down-green-red/http/shields.io.svg)](https://read-comics-tracker.herokuapp.com) [![Maintenance](https://img.shields.io/badge/Maintained%3F-yes-green.svg)](https://GitHub.com/Naereen/StrapDown.js/graphs/commit-activity)

## [WIP]

A personal project that tracks read Marvel Comics, just like tracking watched tv shows.

**It requires Marvel developer public and private API Key.**

It uses strapi and Postgres for a sort of back-end, deployed both on Heroku.
